events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but I want to request a refund because it doesn't fit me well.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's message about returning the product.
Assigning the refund case to our returns specialist to handle the customer's request effectively.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your recent purchase. Iâ€™m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund to proceed with the process?
My order number is 24578932. The jacket is too small despite choosing my usual size, so I would like to return it.
Thank you for the details. We can start your refund immediately and provide you with a prepaid return label to send back the jacket.
That sounds good, thank you. Please send the return label to my email address.
We've sent a return label to your email. Once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm if you have sent back the jacket and if you need any further assistance with your refund.
I returned the jacket yesterday and received confirmation from the courier. Looking forward to the refund being processed.
The refund has been processed successfully to your original payment method. Thank you for your patience and have a great day!
We have sent a short satisfaction survey to your email. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
